item.title: #2021-10-14.work.log
item.description: Install scoop (best thing ever seen in win10 so far, maybe try chocolatey future) git, nodejs, python, neovim, neovide, lazygit maybe understood dll search order Create basic electron app Use electron-builder package electron app msvs x64 for powershell!! I think I need to start learning UI framewor… want to update my log with my github.io Reference DLL search on windows dll search order electron-builder 用 electron-builder 打包應用程式給其他人 Building desktop applications with Electron - electron-builder x64 Developer PowerShell for VS 2019
